name: Galaxy Playground
description:
Controls:

  • Spacebar to start the game
  • Left Click to create gravity wells
  • Scroll-wheel to alter orbiting speed

In the beginning... there was nothing...

Until YOU come in. Create the Big Bang, and start all life!

Move and alter the space dust to form your very own universe!

Note: This game can be very intensive on even high-end hardware! Downloading the game is recommended but be wary that we did not have time to optimise it, so frame drops might occur if many gravity wells are made!

Credits:

  • SeanP for programming/physics work
  • Lazlo319 for graphics
